name: Biokurai
description:
a game made for 'A game by it's cover' and gbjam4!

Controls:

run : wsad / left analogue
sword : left mouse / a / x
gun : (hold) left mouse / a / x
dash : right mouse / b / square

Controller recommended.

by the lovely:

Chance Millar (code) - https://twitter.com/ValeourM

Lhasa Mencur (audio) - https://soundcloud.com/lhasamencur

Kelly Kynoch (env art) - https://twitter.com/kellykynoch

Dickie McCarthy (design/art) - https://twitter.com/_dickie
